overview: Life takes a surprising turn for newly married and miserable bride Moksha (Smriti Mishra) when she visits an art gallery to distract her from her isolation and spies a painting of a woman who looks remarkably like her. As she searches for the artist whose brush appeared to capture her innermost feelings, she makes a series of unexpected discoveries about her true self, and the hopes and dreams she once had.
title: Mitsein
